title: 📝 Daily Summary — Feb 19, 2026
content:
# **February 19, 2026**

## What We Built

### 🎯 Highcharts Stock Chart (Major Replacement)
- **Replaced TradingView Lightweight Charts** with Highcharts Stock ($732/yr SaaS license)
- Wired to **Twelve Data WebSocket** for live candlestick streaming
- Custom **TradingView-style UX**: click-drag to pan, scroll to zoom X-axis, Y auto-fits to visible candles
- Added **Webull-style range and interval controls** (1D, 5D, 1M, 3M, 1Y, All + 1m, 5m, 15m, 30m, 1h, 1D intervals)
- Fixed chart snap-back, drag-pan issues, crosshair flicker, empty space rendering
- Full XY pan+zoom with visible scrollbars and right-offset overscroll
- **87 commits** refining chart UX throughout the day

### 🌐 Global Markets & International Data
- **Twelve Data Pro** ($29/mo) now fully integrated
- Global Markets page with **London Stock Exchange (LSE)** stocks live streaming
- Added LSE stock search, watchlist columns, and TradingView chart exchange mapping
- Four-exchange board: NYSE, NASDAQ, LSE, crypto (expandable to Tokyo, Frankfurt, Hong Kong)
- Default LSE blue chips: SHEL, AZN, HSBA, ULVR, BP, RIO, GSK, BARC, LLOY, VOD, LSEG, BATS

### 📊 Strategy Builder Technical Indicators
- Wired **Twelve Data's 100+ server-side calculated indicators** into Strategy Builder
- Real RSI, MACD, Bollinger Bands, EMA, SMA, Stochastic, ADX, ATR, Supertrend, OBV, Ichimoku
- `evaluateSignals()` function outputs BUY/SELL/HOLD with confidence % using real indicator values
- No more AI-guessed indicator math — all pre-calculated and accurate

### 🎬 Options Chain Improvements
- **Proper layout**: calls left, strikes center, puts right
- DTE centered in strike column, all expirations start collapsed
- V/OI shows dash instead of fake `999x` when OI is 0
- Real-time options flow via **Alpaca OPRA WebSocket**

### 🔔 Trump Intel Scanner (New Cron Job)
- Hourly cron scanner for Trump-related market-moving news
- Scans X/Bloomberg/Yahoo/sports betting/Tesla/SpaceX/M&A
- Saves to `third-brain/market-intel/` + `second-brain/market-intel/`
- **Sophia panel tab** with glow alerts for new intel
- Part of 2-hour market intel cron suite

### 🎨 UI/UX Polish
- **Landing page refresh**: transparent glass auth cards + Milky Way backdrop
- Added social icons to footer (X, Discord, GitHub, Instagram)
- Improved hero vertical centering and spacing
- **Tone down shooting stars** in-app (kept landing page intensity)
- Added **GlobalMarketsBadge** to landing hero flow
- **LSE page**: London Stock Exchange blue wordmark header
- Tightened Sophia panel width, applied iPhone-style chat bubbles
- Watchlist: drag-and-drop reordering for symbols
- Strategy folders: drag-and-drop movement between terminal folders, delete controls

### 🔧 Trade Page Improvements
- **Watchlist tab**: wired Twelve Data WebSocket live stream with panel sizing
- Fixed crypto chart data path and lightweight chart blink
- Added LSE stocks support, chart path integration, and LSE quote API
- Larger open-trade button with green outlined style
- Added **Mag 7 quick tabs** to options page

## What We Fixed

- **Chart rendering**: fixed candles on initial load, prevented blank screen crash, safe module init
- **Chart UX bugs**: zoom snap-back, drag-pan broken, crosshair flicker, empty space, fill height
- **Twelve Data integration**: key fallback, server-side data path, safe error handling
- **Global Markets**: fixed add-stock dropdown blinking loop, exchange symbol alignment
- **Watchlist**: fixed percent flicker, refresh spinner behavior, search issues
- **Options chain**: strike dropdown now triggers refetch, strike column wider + centered
- **ETF symbols**: TradingView exchange mapping for watchlist charts
- **Active strategies**: Resume/Stop inline with row, paused strategy folder count sync
- **Terminal folders**: improved delete controls, active strategy highlighting

## Key Decisions

### 🎯 Chart Migration Path
1. ~~TradingView embed widget~~ (iframe, uses their data not ours) ❌
2. ~~TradingView Lightweight Charts~~ (free, open source, bad UX) ❌
3. **Highcharts Stock** (current, $732/yr, great UX) ✅
4. TradingView Advanced Charts Library (applied, free with attribution, pending approval) 🔄

**Decision**: Stick with Highcharts Stock unless TradingView Advanced Library approval comes through, then consider swap.

### 🌍 Branding: "Global Markets" Not "LSE Markets"
- Page named **Global Markets** to allow future expansion to Tokyo, Frankfurt, Hong Kong without rebranding
- Sidebar icon: 🌐 Globe (not UK flag)
- Scalable to 75+ exchanges with Twelve Data Pro (zero additional cost)

### 💬 Assistant Naming
- **Hard locked to "Sophia"** (commit `57afb67`)
- No more AI-generated assistant names or flexibility — consistency across all interfaces

### 📐 UI Philosophy (Permanent Rules)
- **NO pill/bubble backgrounds** on buttons or labels
- **NO green box buttons** — minimal/outline style only
- Icons: outline only, `fill="none" stroke={color} strokeWidth={1.5}`
- Design direction: "premium, alive, animated, modern, dark"
